text: ` ` I don't do drugs, I hardly drink, I've never committed a crime â€” and yet I'm a bad role model for being proud of my body?'' she asked. ` ` I am empowered by my body. I am empowered by my sexuality. I am empowered by feeling comfortable in my skin. I am empowered by showing the world my flaws and not being afraid of what anyone is going to say about me. And I hope that through this platform I have been given, I can encourage the same empowerment for girls and women all over the world.''
